title: The development of bio-based industry in the European Union: A prospective integrated modelling assessment
content:
Publication date: May 2024

Source: Ecological Economics, Volume 219

Author(s): George Philippidis, Rodrigo Xavier Álvarez, Lorenzo Di Lucia, Hugo González Hermoso, Ana González Martinez, Robert M'barek, Alexander Moiseyev, Calliope Panoutsou, Eva Sevigne Itoiz, Viktoriya Sturm, Myrna van Leeuwen, Willem-Jan van Zeist, Pieter Johannes Verkerk
